1.name: Pagliacci Pizza
1.description:
Classic Italian pizzas with great ingredients, friendly staff and good service. Available by the slice or pie.

2.name: Pogacha
2.description: Absolutely delicious bread 'pogachas' - fresh from the oven!  Almost everything I've had there is delicious especially, homemade soups!  Waiters are very personable üòä and great little outdoor patio area, where you can bring your dog. Click for location and order online!  Raiting üëçüëçüëçüëçüëç

3.name: Just Poke Mercer Island
3.description: Just good poke. Always tastes fresh, good selection of sauces, and I appreciate that they mix your protein with your choice of sauce(s). Click for Menu! Raiting üëçüëçüëçüëçüëç

1.name: Barrels Wine Bar
1.description: This is just the coolest place on the Island. It's great for gathering small groups of friends to sample wine and enjoy the small bites. It makes me happy just thinking about it!

2.name: Shawn's Cafe & Bakery
2.description: Super nice people here who gave me that energy boost that I needed with a fig jam and goat cheese panini and a pretzl roll with sweet mustard dip.

3.name: Mioposto Pizzeria
3.description: Authentic Italian food with an decent selection of beer and drinks. Tasty, fresh pizza, nice patio seating, super friendly service.

1.name: Bar
1.description: The best restaraunt in the world. 5 stars. Love it. In last time I was there with my friends and we had a great time. I recommend to everyone.
